Package playn.core

Added Classes
Tint Tinting related utility methods.
 

Changed Classes and Interfaces
AbstractAssets Base Assets implementation shared among platforms.
AbstractLayer Base Layer implementation shared among platforms (to avoid reinventing the transform logic).
AbstractSound  
Assets Fetches and returns assets.
CachingAssets An Assets wrapper that caches all loaded images and sounds with no expiration mechanism.
Canvas A 2d drawing canvas.
CanvasImage An image that provides a Canvas that allows you to draw directly into the image.
CanvasSurface Implementation class, to be used by platforms that implement Surface as just a special case of Canvas.
Graphics Main 2D graphics interface.
Json.Writer A JsonSink that writes JSON to a string.
Layer Layer is the base element for all rendering in PlayN
Log Simple PlayN logging interface.
LogImpl A common base class for Log implementations.
Sound A sound.
Sound.Silence A sound that does nothing.
Surface TODO
TextLayout Contains metrics and metadata for a laid out body of text.
WatchedAssets An Assets wrapper that tracks the loading status of all asynchronously loaded resources.
